alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 9:25AM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Greenville affecting Pitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tar River at Greenville. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Monday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 8.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM EST.
